title: Zoe is HERE
body: Just wondering why I cannot buy/unlock the new champion with my IP>Blue Essence. I have 169k blue essence, and I can't use them for anything but champs. Sorry I am not going to buy RIOT points just to buy a new champ. I cant even buy runes... This smells like EA. Please fix

replies.body: Champions are always released like part way into the patch, they are never enabled straight away.
Just out of curiosity, how far into the patch? Like a few days or more a few hours? Ballparking.
generally like 5 days into a patch from the last few champions (with the exception of kled).

Like nightjar says, recently the timers have been getting longer, though it could be anywhere between now and next week.

Usually the champions is released with at least a week of the patch left though.
Then why is she in the collection section, with the *Unlock* button?

Because the client is coded like shit, and anything they put through in the patch can be seen, but isn't store available yet.

It's mostly for Rito to make sure they haven't shit the bed and let a major bug through.

Every single time a new champ is released:

"Why aren't they available the new patch is here hurr durr"

Patch Notes - "New champ X will be released **DURING** patch X"
Players - "New champs are always released during the patch not right at the beginning"

_Next champ release _

"WAHHH WHY ISNT THE NEW CHAMP AVAILABLE RIOT WTF"
